## Overview

__StatComp21065__ is a simple R package developed to compare the performance of R and R++ (implemented through the R package _Rcpp_) for the 'Statistical Computing' course. Two functions are considered, namely, _gendata_ (generate two class data for classification) and _bess_svm_ (best subset selection on svm).
